ValidationRule.description: You can't move the contact status to demo no show or demo completed - not qualified unless there is a valid schedule demo date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Demo No Show'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Demo Completed - Not Qualified')), ISBLANK(Scheduled_Demo_Date__c), CONTAINS(Owner.UserRole.Name, 'SMB'), NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), ISBLANK(ADR_Transfer_By__c), ISBLANK(Hot_Transfer_To__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'List Import (no prior engagement)'), ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Outbound call / email / linkedin')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't move the contact status to demo no show or demo completed - not qualified unless there is a valid schedule demo date
